snippet: State officials will return five surviving exotic animals to a woman whose husband released dozens of wild creatures, then committed suicide.
abstract: Ohio state officials will return five surviving exotic animals to Marian Thompson of Zanesville, Ohio; Thompson's husband Terry had released dozens of wild creatures from their home before committing suicide in 2011.
lead_paragraph: State officials will return five surviving exotic animals to a woman whose husband released dozens of wild creatures, then committed suicide.

headline.main: Ohio: Wife Will Get Animals Husband Freed Before Suicide
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Wife Will Get Animals Husband Freed Before Suicide
